author: pharaohh
msg: JSEC-40 - Adjusted Web-based interceptor/filter mechanism.  Made all 'pointcut' behavior consistent across all types of web based interceptors (SecurityContext, Session, Authentication) and for supported subclass implementations (Spring Interceptor, Servlet Filter, etc).

msg: minor adjustments to the samples/spring build setup

msg: updated build environment to make project releases easier

author: pharaohh
msg: JSEC-46 - made changes to the sample app so it is jdbc-driven

author: pharaohh
msg: removed setRealms method from SecurityManager interface (this should be an impl method, not an API interface method forced upon all implementations), added setRealm method to DefaultSecurityManager for convience for single-realm applications (majority).
